00029 #include "../mat2x2.hpp"
00030 #include "../mat3x3.hpp"
00031 #include "../mat4x4.hpp"

00033 namespace glm
00034 {
00035         template <typename T, precision P>
00036         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat3x3<T, P> affineInverse
00037         (
00038                 detail::tmat3x3<T, P> const & m
00039         )
00040         {
00041                 detail::tmat3x3<T, P> Result(m);
00042                 Result[2] = detail::tvec3<T, P>(0, 0, 1);
00043                 Result = transpose(Result);
00044                 detail::tvec3<T, P> Translation = Result * detail::tvec3<T, P>(-detail::tvec2<T, P>(m[2]), m[2][2]);
00045                 Result[2] = Translation;
00046                 return Result;
00047         }
00048 
00049         template <typename T, precision P>
00050         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> affineInverse
00051         (
00052                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m
00053         )
00054         {
00055                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Result(m);
00056                 Result[3] = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0, 0, 0, 1);
00057                 Result = transpose(Result);
00058                 detail::tvec4<T, P> Translation = Result * detail::tvec4<T, P>(-detail::tvec3<T, P>(m[3]), m[3][3]);
00059                 Result[3] = Translation;
00060                 return Result;
00061         }
00062 
00063         template <typename T, precision P>
00064         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat2x2<T, P> inverseTranspose
00065         (
00066                 detail::tmat2x2<T, P> const & m
00067         )
00068         {
00069                 T Determinant = m[0][0] * m[1][1] - m[1][0] * m[0][1];
00070 
00071                 detail::tmat2x2<T, P> Inverse(
00072                         + m[1][1] / Determinant,
00073                         - m[0][1] / Determinant,
00074                         - m[1][0] / Determinant,
00075                         + m[0][0] / Determinant);
00076 
00077                 return Inverse;
00078         }
00079 
00080         template <typename T, precision P>
00081         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat3x3<T, P> inverseTranspose
00082         (
00083                 detail::tmat3x3<T, P> const & m
00084         )
00085         {
00086                 T Determinant =
00087                         + m[0][0] * (m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[1][2] * m[2][1])
00088                         - m[0][1] * (m[1][0] * m[2][2] - m[1][2] * m[2][0])
00089                         + m[0][2] * (m[1][0] * m[2][1] - m[1][1] * m[2][0]);
00090 
00091                 detail::tmat3x3<T, P> Inverse;
00092                 Inverse[0][0] = + (m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2]);
00093                 Inverse[0][1] = - (m[1][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[1][2]);
00094                 Inverse[0][2] = + (m[1][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[1][1]);
00095                 Inverse[1][0] = - (m[0][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[0][2]);
00096                 Inverse[1][1] = + (m[0][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[0][2]);
00097                 Inverse[1][2] = - (m[0][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[0][1]);
00098                 Inverse[2][0] = + (m[0][1] * m[1][2] - m[1][1] * m[0][2]);
00099                 Inverse[2][1] = - (m[0][0] * m[1][2] - m[1][0] * m[0][2]);
00100                 Inverse[2][2] = + (m[0][0] * m[1][1] - m[1][0] * m[0][1]);
00101                 Inverse /= Determinant;
00102 
00103                 return Inverse;
00104         }
00105 
00106         template <typename T, precision P>
00107         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> inverseTranspose
00108         (
00109                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m
00110         )
00111         {
00112                 T SubFactor00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00113                 T SubFactor01 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00114                 T SubFactor02 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00115                 T SubFactor03 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00116                 T SubFactor04 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00117                 T SubFactor05 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00118                 T SubFactor06 = m[1][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[1][3];
00119                 T SubFactor07 = m[1][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[1][3];
00120                 T SubFactor08 = m[1][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[1][2];
00121                 T SubFactor09 = m[1][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[1][3];
00122                 T SubFactor10 = m[1][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[1][2];
00123                 T SubFactor11 = m[1][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[1][3];
00124                 T SubFactor12 = m[1][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[1][1];
00125                 T SubFactor13 = m[1][2] * m[2][3] - m[2][2] * m[1][3];
00126                 T SubFactor14 = m[1][1] * m[2][3] - m[2][1] * m[1][3];
00127                 T SubFactor15 = m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2];
00128                 T SubFactor16 = m[1][0] * m[2][3] - m[2][0] * m[1][3];
00129                 T SubFactor17 = m[1][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[1][2];
00130                 T SubFactor18 = m[1][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[1][1];
00131 
00132                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Inverse;
00133                 Inverse[0][0] = + (m[1][1] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor01 + m[1][3] * SubFactor02);
00134                 Inverse[0][1] = - (m[1][0] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor04);
00135                 Inverse[0][2] = + (m[1][0] * SubFactor01 - m[1][1] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor05);
00136                 Inverse[0][3] = - (m[1][0] * SubFactor02 - m[1][1] * SubFactor04 + m[1][2] * SubFactor05);
00137 
00138                 Inverse[1][0] = - (m[0][1] * SubFactor00 - m[0][2] * SubFactor01 + m[0][3] * SubFactor02);
00139                 Inverse[1][1] = + (m[0][0] * SubFactor00 - m[0][2] * SubFactor03 + m[0][3] * SubFactor04);
00140                 Inverse[1][2] = - (m[0][0] * SubFactor01 - m[0][1] * SubFactor03 + m[0][3] * SubFactor05);
00141                 Inverse[1][3] = + (m[0][0] * SubFactor02 - m[0][1] * SubFactor04 + m[0][2] * SubFactor05);
00142 
00143                 Inverse[2][0] = + (m[0][1] * SubFactor06 - m[0][2] * SubFactor07 + m[0][3] * SubFactor08);
00144                 Inverse[2][1] = - (m[0][0] * SubFactor06 - m[0][2] * SubFactor09 + m[0][3] * SubFactor10);
00145                 Inverse[2][2] = + (m[0][0] * SubFactor11 - m[0][1] * SubFactor09 + m[0][3] * SubFactor12);
00146                 Inverse[2][3] = - (m[0][0] * SubFactor08 - m[0][1] * SubFactor10 + m[0][2] * SubFactor12);
00147 
00148                 Inverse[3][0] = - (m[0][1] * SubFactor13 - m[0][2] * SubFactor14 + m[0][3] * SubFactor15);
00149                 Inverse[3][1] = + (m[0][0] * SubFactor13 - m[0][2] * SubFactor16 + m[0][3] * SubFactor17);
00150                 Inverse[3][2] = - (m[0][0] * SubFactor14 - m[0][1] * SubFactor16 + m[0][3] * SubFactor18);
00151                 Inverse[3][3] = + (m[0][0] * SubFactor15 - m[0][1] * SubFactor17 + m[0][2] * SubFactor18);
00152 
00153                 T Determinant =
00154                         + m[0][0] * Inverse[0][0]
00155                         + m[0][1] * Inverse[0][1]
00156                         + m[0][2] * Inverse[0][2]
00157                         + m[0][3] * Inverse[0][3];
00158 
00159                 Inverse /= Determinant;
00160 
00161                 return Inverse;
00162         }
00163 }//namespace glm
